faqs.question: Is Boom Beach free to play?
faqs.answer: Yes, Boom Beach is free to play with optional in-game purchases.

faqs.question: Is Boom Beach more PvE or PvP?
faqs.answer: Boom Beach is heavily PvE-focused, with optional PvP elements.

faqs.question: What makes Boom Beach different from Clash of Clans?
faqs.answer: Boom Beach focuses more on offensive strategy, troop control, and real-time tactical attacks.

faqs.question: Can I play Boom Beach offline?
faqs.answer: No, an internet connection is required to play.

faqs.question: Is Boom Beach still updated?
faqs.answer: Yes, Supercell continues to support the game with events and seasonal content.
